citeinfo.origin: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
citeinfo.title: Terrastat

pubinfo.publish: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations

descript.abstract: Terrastat provides land resource potential and constraints statistics at country and regional level.
descript.purpose: The purpose of the dataset was to provide statistics on soil constraints, desert and dryland areas, human-induced land degradation.
descript.supplinf: Information was obtained from http://www.fao.org/ag/agl/agll/terrastat/. (previous geoform was 'Database')

spdom.descgeog: Asia and Pacific, Europe, North Africa and Near East, North America, North Asia, east of Urals, South and Central America, subSaharan Africa, World

citeinfo.origin: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
citeinfo.title: Land Resource Potential and Constraints at Regional and Country Levels

attracc.attraccr: The national statistics given are estimates based on various small scale maps and inventories that were not always up to date, reliable or both. Results therefore, in particular for small countries, are to be interpreted with care. Please note that the indicators used in the headings are fully defined in the publication listed in Cross Reference, and should be consulted to correctly indicate their meaning and limitations.

dataqual.complete: Depends upon the attributes and the country.

distinfo.distliab: Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the Food and Agriculture Organization, no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the accuracy or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from a Food and Agriculture Organization server, and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. It is also strongly recommended that careful attention be paid to the contents of the metadata file associated with these data. The Food and Agriculture Organization shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein.
